<S%H7126>"Come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to Me, <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H384>this:<s%> From the <S%H7218>first<s%> I have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in <S%H5643>secret,<s%> From the <S%H6256>time<s%> it <S%H1961>took<s%> <S%H1961>place,<s%> I was <S%H8033>there.<s%> And <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> Me, and His <S%H7307>Spirit.<s%>"
